api_list.name: stockAlert
api_list.description: Post call to alert inventory management on low stocks
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://boomi_inventory.p.rapidapi.com/stockAlert"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "boomi_inventory.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://boomi_inventory.p.rapidapi.com/stockAlert"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "boomi_inventory.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
